data.text:
Brilliant hotel plus service especially from Rosalie  a credit to the hotel!!
Fab  food good location all staff good back in sept!rosalie looked  after us daily nothing too much trouble .the pool guy was very helpful as well.
Very clean,  I went all inclusive very good value for money.
data.title: Brilliant hotel, brill bar, and best of all a girl called Rosalie  who looked after us so much so going back in Sept.

data.text:
Good location and courteous staff specially Simran and Dawda at the reception, they were super helpful.
Food is good with variety of options..just one feedback for the travel desk there. I booked for premium desert safari with Rayna and was assured of best quality camp but in the end, we were taken to 'Total desert camp' as the travel desk overbooked beyond capacity. The camp was really pathetic with cold food, accessibility and rude staff..I think this camp should be blacklisted by the hotel travel desk. Rest everything was good.
data.title: Very good for family stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest

Thank you very much for your review on Tripadvisor

I am glad to read your wonderful comments regarding your experience. Your feedback and ratings are important to us as these will assist us to ensure we exceed our guests' expectations.

Thank you for your kind feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back at Jumeira Rotana.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ulrich Hoffmeister

data.text: I have stayed here twice and being a tourist, I feel safe and familiar here. Food is decent and the rooms are quite big. I would prefer here if I visit again and anytime later. Adil at the reception was kind enough to give us early check in as we had an early morning flight and an infant and a toddler with me. Great hospitality.
data.title: Safe and comfortable

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor.

I am truly pleased to read your positive comment and I wish to assure you that I will not miss thanking all my colleagues who made your visit a memorable one.

Thank you once again and we look forward to welcoming you back to Jumeira Rotana.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ulrich Hoffmeister

data.text: Jumeira Rotana Hotel excels in service, with impeccable room cleaning. The international cuisine is truly outstanding, making every dining experience delightful. A top-notch choice for those who appreciate both quality service and exquisite food.
data.title: The hotel service is really nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor.

It is always rewarding to receive such praise regarding our products and services. Compliments like yours keep us all very motivated in creating an amazing experience for our guests.

The whole team looks forward to welcoming you back soon.

Best regards,

Ulrich Hoffmeister
General Manager
owner_response.author: Ulrich Hoffmeister

data.text:
Very good value for money. We went as a family of 3 (3 year old toddler), location is excellent as it’s very central. 

Breakfast is average with very limited space as the restaurant is tiny, be prepared to stand a while if you go late. As someone with a toddler, this wasnt great for us.

The A La Carte served in boston bar &grill is amazing and not pricey, highly recommend. We had half board and it was nice to choose between lunch or dinner, some hotels dont offer this option so this was a nice touch.

We had an issue with our room and the hotel was kind enough to move us to another room same night. Many thanks to Adil and Mohsin at front reception for this.

The staff at the hotel are very good and friendly, Ariful in housekeeping was kind enough to help us set up in our new room and rooms were serviced daily which is nice.

Overall I was very happy and would come back again.
data.title: Great Value for Money
